Title: Country

See full summary » Gilbert Ivy and his wife Jewell are farmers. They seem to be working against the odds, producing no financial surplus. Gilbert has lost hope of ever becoming prosperous, but his wife decides to fight for her family. Written by Mattias Thuresson
Keywords: farmer, struggle for land, oppression, justice, broken home
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 2 nominations.
Actors: Jessica Lange, Sam Shepard, Wilford Brimley
Description: Directed by Richard Pearce.  With Jessica Lange, Sam Shepard, Wilford Brimley, Matt Clark. Gilbert Ivy and his wife Jewell are farmers. They seem to be working against the odds, producing no financial surplus. Gilbert has lost hope of ever becoming prosperous, but his wife decides to fight for her family.
